doc.field: "Written and Pictorial Diary" | dog tag and medals
"Written and Pictorial Diary" | dog tag and medals
The medals and dog tag are sewn to a loose scrapbook page.
02 | "For Service On The Mexican Border"; no. 3357 (on rim); plus ribbon bar.
03 | "Mexican Border Service / 1916-1917 / Presented By / State of New York"; no. 10050 (on rim).
04 | World War I Victory Medal ("The Great War for Civilization") with bars for "Somme Offensive," "Ypres-Lys," and "Defensive Sector"; plus ribbon bar with three battle stars.
05 | "For Faithful State Service in the Field During the World War" (obverse); "Presented by the State of New York / 1917 / 1918 / 1919" (reverse); no. 3105 (on reverse).
06 | "World War" (obverse); "For Service 1917-1919 Presented by the State of New York" (reverse); no. 52119 (on reverse).
"Written and Pictorial Diary" | dog tag and medals
